description: We do not charge the buyer. Azzure offers you this exceptional, exclusive and unique opportunity, there is nothing like it in Velilla and even less for this price. 105m apartment plus an impressive 25m terrace, renovated and ready to move into, is distributed in a hall, large living room, fully furnished kitchen, 3 large bedrooms, a full bathroom and a toilet. Armored main door, white lacquered solid wood doors, wooden floors, aluminum windows, tilt-parallel PVC terrace door, fitted and lined wardrobes, air conditioning with heat pump. Excellent condition, very bright apartment. Unbeatable location very close to all services. Garage space included in the price and in the property itself. Private urbanization with community pool. Today, as always, you will find the best offers with the best service at azzure, just check it out and without charging the buyer 3 or 4%. Azzure 26 years in Velilla making our neighbors' dreams come true. Do you want to fulfill yours? call us.

Ground floor apartment facing the main street with swimming pool, with a built area extending to approximately 76 s. q. m. It is distributed in 3 bedrooms, a living room, 2 bathrooms, a kitchen and a terrace. Installation of heating radiators and ducted air-conditioning systems Make your offer and we will forward it to the vendor. This offer will not be binding until its acceptance and formal presentation. You will find more information in the Terms and Conditions. Additional information can be found within the legal section. Velilla de San Antonio is a municipality in Madrid, located between Mejorada del Campo and Rivas Vaciamadrid, about 22 km from the capital of Spain, connected by highways and roads. It has all kinds of services in its vicinity. Very good communication by M-208, R-3 and A-3. Exclusive sale with Housell. From private to private. Call us and visit this house. 80 m² apartment in Velilla de San Antonio, province of Madrid. Due to the space it offers, this apartment is ideal for a couple and investors. It is located on the ground floor and has a large living room, a fitted kitchen, completely independent from the rest of the rooms and equipped with appliances, two bedrooms, a complete bathroom and a functional guest toilet. In addition, the apartment has built-in wardrobes, to increase the storage capacity of your home. The property is all exterior, with a community garden where you will take advantage of the good weather and a community pool so you can enjoy the hot days. This apartment is located on an easily accessible road, due to its east orientation, in this house you will enjoy the sun in the mornings. The house is sold furnished and in good condition so that you can settle as soon as possible. As for the qualities, this apartment has electric heating, aluminum exterior carpentry, stoneware floors, easy maintenance and great resistance. To make you feel more secure in your home, the main door is armored. This house is located in a quiet area, well connected, very close to the bus stop. For greater comfort, the house is very close to a medical center, a school and all the necessary services. h1o4u0s1e5l3l.

Exclusive sale with Housell, from individual to individual. Spacious villa with a surface area of 120 m² and a plot of 125 m², where you can enjoy your leisure time without leaving home, in Velilla de San Antonio, province of Madrid. This house, due to its size, meets the needs of a family with children. This chalet is 3 stories high and has a bright living room, a fitted kitchen, absolutely independent from the rest of the rooms and equipped with appliances, four bedrooms, a full bathroom and a functional toilet. In addition, the chalet has a backyard, so you can have breakfast outdoors, and built-in wardrobes to optimize your storage space. The property is all exterior, with a private garden where you will take advantage of the good weather. This chalet is located on an easily accessible road, it has a storage room in the attic, so you can take advantage of all the space in the house. Due to its north orientation, it is a house that receives the sun in the morning but is not hot in the summer months. The house is sold unfurnished and renovated, ready to move into. As for the qualities, this chalet has natural gas heating, aluminum exterior carpentry with double windows, wooden floors, which give a lot of warmth to the home, and stoneware floors, which are easy to maintain and highly resistant. To make you feel safer in your home, the main door is reinforced. This house is located in the center of town, a well-connected area, very close to the bus stop and the train station. For greater comfort, the house is very close to a medical center, a school and all the necessary services. At Housell we offer you a large selection of properties that adapt to your lifestyle. Don't miss this opportunity to find the perfect house for you. h1o3u9s9e3l5l.

Grupo Inmobilia exclusively offers for sale this magnificent 4-bedroom ready-to-move-in duplex located in the municipality of Velilla de San Antonio, between Rivas del Jarama, Rivas Vaciamadrid and Mejorada del Campo. It is located in a modern building built in 2004 and located on Guerrita Street, between Belmonte and Frascuelo streets and a few meters from the Plaza de Perú and the urban center, with the City Hall, the Sports Center and the fairgrounds as the main ones. bastions of it. The home in question is a duplex located on the second floor of the property, without an elevator, ready to move into, and has a constructed area of 131 cadastral square meters. It has the following distribution: on the first floor we find the entrance hall, a large living room in two rooms, of more than 20 square meters with access to an open terrace, a separate kitchen, a complete bathroom and one of the 4 bedrooms. And on the second floor we have a large hall with a built-in wardrobe, 3 bedrooms and the second full bathroom. It has individual heating and hot water and south-west orientation. Highlight the proximity to the Velilla lagoons with the bird viewpoint and the "El Soto" and "El Picón de los rabbitos" lagoons as some of the most important tourist attractions in the area. Access by public transport with several long-distance buses (2 85, 341, N203) from different areas of the capital such as Avda. del Mediterráneo, Avda. of America, Ciudad Lineal or Coslada.

suggestedTexts: {'title': 'Flat in Calle la Valeta no number'}
description: Welcome to RESIDENCIAL VELILLA FUTURA. In our new project (phase 2), we are committed to housing: spacious, comfortable, sustainable and within your reach, integrated in an urbanization with all the services that allow it to be a space for coexistence and in a building with style, design and its own personality. The homes will have energy rating A (the maximum), which will mean significant savings in electricity and heating bills, as well as savings in the interest rates applied by financial institutions when contracting a mortgage. To highlight the double acoustic and thermal insulation in the homes, in addition to being equipped with a refreshing underfloor heating system (for heat and cold), which saves space by eliminating radiators and also implies lower energy consumption, being more sustainable. The windows are made of PVC with double glazing type climalit and thermal break. The homes also incorporate an individual mechanical ventilation system, consisting of the renovation of the interior air of the home, automatically adapting to the humidity rate and / or the presence of occupants. The homes will have built-in wardrobes, as well as a fitted kitchen consisting of high and low-capacity cabinets with a worktop and equipped with a sink, a tap with aerators to reduce consumption, an oven, a microwave, a vitro-ceramic induction hob and an extractor hood. All homes have a terrace. The price includes a garage and storage room. The promotion has large common areas with: -Multi-purpose social premises. -Pool with large solarium area. -Concierge control booth, garden area and children's play area.

RAYMU sells in Velilla de San Antonio Profitable housing, with a long-term rental contract (ideal for investing). Wonderful duplex in perfect condition of 83.72 m2, fully furnished and equipped with appliances, very bright, with two large double bedrooms, on the second floor, exterior, with elevator.Unbeatable construction qualities and highly consistent thermal and acoustic insulation.It is very important to highlight the elimination of outside noise and energy savings (heating, air conditioning, etc.).Facade with exterior monolayer coating, brick, interior cement plaster, expanded polyurethane plaster over it, air chamber, brick, plaster and smooth paint and smooth paint throughout the house, with operable windows with double glazing and thermal blinds, floors of floating flooring on the ground floor and oak parquet on the upper floor, except for the kitchen and bathrooms which are made of stoneware, interior doors in oak wood, exterior access door to the home armored in oak wood, two closets large capacity built-in oak wood, separate living room with wide marble staircase to go up to the upper floor, toilet on the lower floor and complete bathroom with hydromassage bathtub on the upper floor, TV and telephone installation in all rooms except bathrooms and kitchen, as well as having pre-installation for new technologies, clothesline, electric intercom, latest technology electric heating (blue heat) with the advantage that each radiator has a built-in independent programmer, in this way we can program each room of the house individually and adapted to our needs of use, hot water by electric water heater with a capacity of 100 liters. Located in the best area of Velilla de San Antonio, in the center of the municipality, in an area with only residential traffic, with all services a few meters away, stops for different bus lines, María Pineda auditorium, library, restaurants, supermarkets, center health and square where the town hall, banks, pharmacy, tobacconist's shop are located, 1 KM from the R3 that connects us without paying toll with the M50, M45, M40, A3, A2, etc., 15 minutes by car from the Hospital del Henares and 20 minutes from the airport. Its wonderful outdoor areas are detailed with simply 4 words: Southeast Regional Park.Area protected by the Community of Madrid for its beautiful lagoons, rivers, flora and fauna, ideal for different types of sports (photography, fishing, cycling, running, etc.), or simply to disconnect by walking and enjoying nature and the landscape without pollution.

INMOVELILLA sells an exclusive single-family home, it consists of a first floor with a large kitchen, toilet, living room with two levels, exit to the porch and garden, second floor with three bedrooms and two bathrooms, master bedroom with full bathroom and dressing area (previously two rooms), housing with many possibilities. Communal swimming pool If you are looking for a home to have your business in, don't miss it, since the basement is fully prepared for it. Taxes and agency fees not included in the price We have an office in Velilla, Calle Mayor 3.

The CPM International Real Estate Agency manages this magnificent and bright villa for sale, 222 m2, 4 bedrooms, terrace and pool, close to the Joselito-Saiz De Rueda bus station, which consists of the following elements: Entrance hall. A kitchen with an office, fully furnished and equipped with all appliances included. A spacious and bright living-dining room, divided into two rooms, with large windows that lead to the large terrace and pool. A very bright room, with built-in wardrobes, en suite, with its integrated full bathroom. 1 fully functional toilet. First floor: 3 large bedrooms, with built-in wardrobes; the main one with a terrace and en suite, with its integrated full bathroom. 1 full bathroom. Basement: Large living room, gym area and multimedia area to watch movies. Garage for two cars and a large storage room. The chalet has natural wooden flooring, double glazed windows, armored door, germicidal treatment pool (by germicidal lights), doors with remote control, air conditioning by hot/cold pump, solar panels, hot water and individual heating by natural gas boiler. The location of the chalet is unbeatable, since it is close to the Joselito-Saiz De Rueda bus station. Taxi ranks and different bus lines stop in front of the property. Access to the M-208 is very fast. Around the chalet there are several shopping centers (H2O Centro Comercial, Centro Comercial Los Madroños), schools (Escuelas Infantiles Velilla - Guarderia, Academia LEVEL UP), hospitals (Perimed Salud, Hospital HM Rivas), and a variety of restaurants.

Promored puts 39 homes on the market on Sainz Romillo Street, 1, Velilla de San Antonio. Lares de Velilla Centro is a closed residential development, which has 1,2 and 3 bedroom homes with storage room, garages and common areas. Among the different types of housing you can find the one that best suits your preferences and needs. The interiors are cared for down to the smallest detail, opting for bright and comfortable rooms. They have an intelligent distribution, designed for maximum use, functionality and comfort, without forgetting design and aesthetics. The materials are meticulously selected by our technical team, to enjoy all the advantages they can bring us.Homes, with 1, 2 and 3 bedrooms, modern living rooms.Ground floors with generous gardens and penthouses with modern terraces. INMOVELILLA. Sells an exclusive fantastic purchase opportunity in one of the best areas of the municipality, semi-detached house of 254 square meters built, Ground floor: entrance to the house by staircase to an armored door and armored glass, a 7-meter hall with access to a living-dining room of approximately 40 meters, it has a fireplace with a motorized cassette, the old terrace was incorporated into the same living room with a new installation of Aluminum exterior carpentry and wooden interior with tilt-and-turn opening, double glazed windows and automated security blinds. The living room has a toilet of 2.3 square meters and access to a patio/back garden of approximately 40 square meters. 12 square meter kitchen recently renovated with large capacity furniture and Silestone countertop and exterior to the same street, 2.3 meter boiler room with PVC window. First floor: consists of 4 bedrooms, 3 of them with custom built-in wardrobes perfectly covered in wood, two bathrooms, one en suite in the main room. The bathroom belonging to the rest of the rooms is completely renovated with a 1.40 cm2 shower, screen and large radiator/towel rack. In two of the bedrooms the windows are PVC, tilt-and-turn with double glazed windows and roll-up mosquito nets. Attic: Open space of 41 m2, double insulation on vertical walls, with three Velux windows with automatic aluminum blinds and two radiators. Basement: divided into two rooms, one of them for use as a living room, games room or meeting room, completely adequate and isolated with a double wall towards the backyard, the other room is used as a laundry room. On the same floor we have the garage, space for two cars, 32m2, with electric charger, the garage has a window to the backyard also made of aluminum and tilt-and-turn and bars. description: Welcome to RESIDENCIAL VELILLA FUTURA. In our new project (phase 2), we are committed to housing: spacious, comfortable, sustainable and within your reach, integrated in an urbanization with all the services that allow it to be a space for coexistence and in a building with style, design and its own personality. The homes will have energy rating A (the maximum), which will mean significant savings in electricity and heating bills, as well as savings in the interest rates applied by financial institutions when contracting a mortgage. To highlight the double acoustic and thermal insulation in the homes, in addition to being equipped with a refreshing underfloor heating system (for heat and cold), which saves space by eliminating radiators and also implies lower energy consumption, being more sustainable. The windows are made of PVC with double glazing type climalit and thermal break. The homes also incorporate an individual mechanical ventilation system, consisting of the renovation of the interior air of the home, automatically adapting to the humidity rate and / or the presence of occupants. The homes will have built-in wardrobes, as well as a fitted kitchen consisting of high and low-capacity cabinets with a worktop and equipped with a sink, a tap with aerators to reduce consumption, an oven, a microwave, a vitro-ceramic induction hob and an extractor hood. All homes have a terrace. The price includes a garage and storage room. The promotion has large common areas with: -Multi-purpose social premises. -Pool with large solarium area. -Concierge control booth, garden area and children's play area.
